actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that vocational and technical education programs should be treated on an equal basis with other education programs in the administration of Federal student loan insurance programs and Federal guaranteed student loan programs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that students pursuing education in vocational schools or technical schools be treated on an equal basis with students in other institutions of higher education by the Congress, the Office of Education in the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, and any other agency of the Federal Government administering education programs.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that vocational and technical education programs should be treated on an equal basis with other education programs in the administration of Federal student loan insurance programs and Federal guaranteed student loan programs.
